physical_appearance:This is a pictorial of a half dressed fisherman who has his head wrapped with a piece of cloth. The print shows yellowing along its edges. In particular
 a strip of browning/ blacking has occurred on its top right corner. Spotting can also be seen on the backing which the print is mounted on.

 Singapore 7
sgcool_label_text:Ho Koon Sang was a member of the Photographic Society of Singapore and an Associate of the Royal Photographic Society in London. This photograph was part of a set of 12 prints sent to the Royal Photographic Society in 1956.
